Package Week5Bootcamp.edu.monash.fit2099

Class AutoShowroom

java.lang.Object
Week5Bootcamp.edu.monash.fit2099.AutoShowroom
public class AutoShowroom
extends java.lang.Object
This is a AutoShowroom class. This class combines almost all classes implemented in this project. It also has some custom ArrayList and HashMap to allow extensions
Since:
29/08/2021
Version:
1.1
Author:
Yo Kogure
See Also:
BidsManager, Buyer
